info.name: Burglar
info.description: Burglar Treasure Hunter Specialty from The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying

element.name: Burglar
element.source: The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying

description.p: Yours are the venerable arts of pickpocketing, lock picking, or otherwise getting hold of the possessions of others and accessing protected areas.
Burglar wants a good job, plenty of Excitement and reasonable Reward, that's how it is usually read.

element.name: Clever-Handed
element.source: The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying

description.p: Starting at 3rd level, you can use the bonus action granted by your Cunning Action to make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check or take the utilize action.

sheet.description: You can use the bonus action granted by your Cunning Action to make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check or take the utilize action.

element.name: Tree-Climber
element.source: The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying

description.p: Also at 3rd level, you gain the ability to climb faster than normal; climbing no longer costs you extra movement.
In addition, you can add your Dexterity modifier to Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb or jump, and to the distance you cover (in feet) when you make a running jump.

sheet.description: Climbing no longer costs you extra movement. In addition, you can add your Dexterity modifier ({{dexterity:modifier}}) to Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb or jump, and to the distance you cover (in feet) when you make a running jump.

element.name: Quiet-Footed
element.source: The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying

description.p: Starting at 7th level, you have advantage on Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) and Dexterity (Stealth) checks if you move no more than half your speed on the same turn.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) and Dexterity (Stealth) checks if you move no more than half your speed on the same turn.
